name: Jetstream Courier
description:
Developed by Group 3 as part of Staffordshire Universities collaborative games module.

Play as a courier who must race around the busy Tokyo suburbs is order to deliver the packages, race against the clock to earn stars, unlock prizes and beat your high scores.
